text:
The Anti-Corruption Bureau has questioned retired IAS officer G. S. Sandhu in connection with a land deal case of 2011.

Sandhu appeared before the ACB on Tuesday, investigating officer Bajrang Shekhawat said. Sandhu, the then Additional Principal Secretary of Rajasthan’s Urban Development and Housing Ministry (UDH), has been summoned again on March 29 for questioning in connection with the illegal transfer of lease deed of a cooperative land to a private firm in 2011. - PTI
title: ACB quizzes retired IAS officer in land scam case
